RootLayout.meta_description: Rolitt is a next-generation AI companion that supports your daily life.

CTA.title: Ready to join the future?
CTA.description: Reserve your AI companion now and be among the first to experience the future of companionship.

Footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Rolitt Inc. Based on love, passion and sustained effort. All rights reserved.
Footer.company_description: Rolitt is a next-generation AI companion that combines emotion recognition, natural language processing, and machine learning technologies to provide compassionate emotional support and intelligent interactions.
Footer.newsletter_description: Get updates about our latest products, features, and announcements.

Newsletter.success_message: Thank you for subscribing! We've sent you a welcome email.
Newsletter.error_message: Sorry, an error occurred during subscription. Please try again later.
Newsletter.already_subscribed: This email address is already subscribed to the newsletter.
Newsletter.invalid_email_format: Please enter a valid email address

CookieBanner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, provide personalized content, and analyze traffic. By clicking 'Accept', you consent to our use of cookies.

MetaPixelTest.title: Meta Pixel Test Page
MetaPixelTest.description: This page is for testing Meta Pixel integration. Trigger events and check the logs below.
MetaPixelTest.pixelNotInitialized: Meta Pixel script loaded but not initialized with ID.
MetaPixelTest.pixelIdError: Error accessing Pixel ID from fbq. Attempting fallback.
MetaPixelTest.pixelLoadedEnv: Meta Pixel ID from environment variables: {id}
MetaPixelTest.pixelIdNotFound: Meta Pixel ID not found in fbq state or environment variables.
MetaPixelTest.fbqNotFound: window.fbq (Meta Pixel) not found. It may be blocked or not loaded.
MetaPixelTest.pixelInactive: Meta Pixel is inactive or not loaded
MetaPixelTest.addToCartEventSent: Add to cart event sent: Product: {name}, Value: {value}, Currency: {currency}

NotFound.meta_description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

NotFound.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

Error.title: Something went wrong!
